def_en: A schedule is a plan that gives a list of events or tasks and the times at which each one should happen or be done.
You can use schedule to refer to the time or way something is planned to be done. For example, if something is completed on schedule, it is completed at the time planned.
If something is scheduled to happen at a particular time, arrangements are made for it to happen at that time.

def_cn: (价格、细节或条件等的)一览表，明细表，清单
def_en: A schedule is a written list of things, for example a list of prices, details, or conditions.

def_cn: (火车、客轮、公共汽车或航班的)时刻表,时间表
def_en: A schedule is a list of all the times when trains, boats, buses, or aircraft are supposed to arrive at or leave a particular place.
In a school or college, a schedule is a diagram that shows the times in the week at which particular subjects are taught.
